name: Feedcoyote
description: For freelancers that have a problem of lack of connectivity and experience economic isolation, we provide a collaboration network platform that connects and helps them collaborate together on various short-term projects and speed up project completion.
one_liner: For freelancers that have a problem of lack of connectivity and experience economic isolation, we provide a collaboration network platform that connects and helps them collaborate together on various short-term projects and speed up project completion.
